short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This browser extension gives the user happiness each time they open a new tab

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Discover Happiness with Every New Tab!

Transform your browsing experience with our innovative browser extension designed to bring joy and productivity to your day.

‚ú® AI-Powered Chat Experience
Meet Filo, your intelligent chat companion. Ask questions, get instant answers, and engage in fun conversations, all seamlessly integrated into your new tab.

üåÑ Customizable Background Themes
Personalize your browsing experience with stunning random backgrounds based on your chosen themes. Whether you love 'flowers', 'china', or any other topic, enjoy a fresh, beautiful image every time you open a new tab.

üîç Convenient Google Search
Enhance your search efficiency with an integrated Google search input right on your new tab page. Quickly find what you need without any extra clicks.

üì∂ Instant Online Status
Easily check your online status at a glance. Stay informed about your connectivity without any hassle, directly from your new tab page.

üìë Additional Features

*** Easy access to your saved browser bookmarks
*** Option to show or hide search input and quotes
*** Adjustable time format (12-hour or 24-hour)

Crafted and created by Abdo Mohamadeen
Explore more about me on LinkedIn (https://www.linkedin.com/in/abdo2m2) and check out the source code on GitHub (https://github.com/abdo/dashboard-browser-extension)
